title: Favourite 20 fonts?
content:
For all purposes, anything you want.  
I'm quite new to enjoying typefaces and I would like to see which people like.
author: Oliver Is Fiction

comments.content:
I have done two more projects lately using [Dolly](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720132444/http:/www.underware.nlsite2index.php/?id1=dolly&id2=overview). And I also use [ApexNew](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720132444/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexNew/mudTyper+Weights/) quite often. I am working now with [Bulldog](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720132444/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bulldog&x=0&y=0) on a project.

Not twenty faces, I know, but a few that I like.

Sharon

**San-serifs:**

URW Grotesk  
Meta  
Helvetica

**Serifs:**  
Mrs. Eaves  
Caslon

**Scripts:**  
Bickham Script (lots of great swash characters)  
Penman

Current faves (and working with them):

Locator (Process Type)  
National (via Village)  
Auto (Underware)  
Amorinda (wonderful script)  
P22 Zebra (fun!)  
Kinescope (vintage by Mark Simonson)  
Most of Jos Buivenga’s fonts.  
All time: PMS Caecilia.  
Workhorse: FF Meta.

You will have to find the links yourself. It’s late here…

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
